## Atomic vector

```{r}
num1 <- 5
vNum1 <- c(2,5)
vNum2 <- c(2, num1)
# 右邊num1是在call num1, 會得到5，相當於
vNum2 <- c(2,5)
```

Stacking vectors
```{r}
vNum1 <- c(-1,5)
vNum2 <- c(2,3)
vNum3 <- c(vNum1,vNum2)
vNum4 <- c(-1,5,2,3)
vNum5 <- c(c(-1,5),c(2,3))
```

```{r}
vNumComplex <- c(c(1,3,c(-5,23)))
vNumComplexNotComplesAtAll <-
  c(1,3,-5,23)
```
